dev.lyze.gdxtinyvg.drawers

Class GradientShapeDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.earlygrey.shapedrawer.AbstractShapeDrawer
      • space.earlygrey.shapedrawer.ShapeDrawer
        • dev.lyze.gdxtinyvg.drawers.GradientShapeDrawer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GradientStyleShapeDrawer

    public class GradientShapeDrawer
extends space.earlygrey.shapedrawer.ShapeDrawer
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    An extension to the ShapeDrawer which supports drawing objects with a gradient shader.
